title: The Authority may permit implementation of Affordable Housing Scheme in accordance with the provisions of these Regulations
clause_text: The Authority may permit implementation of Affordable Housing Scheme in accordance with the provisions of these Regulations. Affordable Housing Scheme (hereinafter referred to as ‗the Scheme‘) shall be permissible only on the lands situated within the limits of Municipal Corporation.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
